extendedInfo.description: The Nursing in Practice app brings award-winning healthcare content to your mobile device. Download the app today to access:-	Issues of the acclaimed Nursing in Practice magazine -	News, articles and features on nursing -	Primary care research and professional insight  -	Guidelines and professional development contentFor over ten years Nursing in Practice has been the leading magazine and website for primary and community care nurses. It also stages the UK's largest conferences and exhibitions for primary care nurses. These events â in association with the CPHVA and Unite and supported by the RCGP, and fully accredited by the RCN Accreditation Unit â are run annually in Belfast, Bournemouth Newcastle, Manchester, Glasgow, Cardiff, London, Birmingham, Plymouth, Norwich, Doncaster and Liverpool.

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I love it. It helps me to understand more about nursing and my role as a new childrens nurse. Great contect and quality. But why only 2issues? Dissapointed in that. Add more please!!!

reviews.title: Good,  but can\'t zoom in
reviews.comment: Good app,  but can\'t zoom in on S3 so makes it almost unusable.
reviews.author: Thomas Mann
